created_at.description: The time when this document is added to this collection

updated_at.description: The last time when this document is updated (to reflect latest statistics)

language.description: Main programming language (as returned by GitHub), can be null

repo_created_at.description: The time when this repository is created in GitHub

monthly_stars.description: A time series describing number of newly received stars in each month since repository creation

month.description: The month, should be the starting date (e.g., 2020-01-01 00:00:00+00)

count.description: Number of stars received in this month, can be an approximate value

monthly_commits.description: A time series describing number of new commits each month since repository creation

month.description: The month, should be the starting date (e.g., 2020-01-01 00:00:00+00)

count.description: Number of new commits in this month, can be an approximate value

monthly_issues.description: A time series describing number of new issues each month since repository creation

month.description: The month, should be the starting date (e.g., 2020-01-01 00:00:00+00)

count.description: Number of new issues in this month, can be an approximate value

monthly_pulls.description: A time series describing number of new pull requests each month since repository creation

month.description: The month, should be the starting date (e.g., 2020-01-01 00:00:00+00)

count.description: Number of new pull requests in this month, can be an approximate value
